bookmarkMessage: Hey! Like what you see? Bookmark me so you can find me easily next time! 💫
heroSubtitle: Stitch screenshots, crop, compress, and create comparison images online. No installation required, works in your browser.
review1: Perfect for stitching chat screenshots. Simple and fast!
review2: No login required, privacy-focused. Exactly what I needed.
review3: Great for creating tutorial images. One-click copy is amazing!
featuresSubtitle: Powerful tools for combining and editing screenshots
smartAlignDesc: Automatically align and snap screenshots together with precision guides.
annotateDesc: Add text, arrows, shapes, and drawings to highlight important areas.
privacyDesc: Blur or pixelate sensitive information before sharing.
exportDesc: Export as PNG, JPG, or PDF. Copy to clipboard for instant sharing.
cookieMessage: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.
blogSubtitle: Tips, tutorials, and stories about screenshot stitching
article1Title: How I Used Screenshot Stitching to Communicate My Design Ideas to AI
article1Excerpt: I had a simple design idea but struggled to explain it to AI. By searching for design inspiration, stitching different UI concepts together, and adding text annotations, I finally made AI understand my vision and created a great website.
article2Title: Goodbye Complex Software: One Webpage for All Your Image Needs
article2Excerpt: Tired of downloading heavy software just to crop an image or add a blur? Discover how PictriKit replaces complex tools with a simple, no-login, privacy-focused online solution for all your daily image processing needs.
ctaDesc: Free, no login required, start creating immediately
